American Civil Liberties Union has uncovered thousands of pages of government documents that show that torture was authorized at the highest levels of the Bush administration. Jameel Jaffer , Deputy Legal Director of the ACLU: Mr. Donald Rumsfeld 's claim that the abuse at Abu Ghraib was isolated and aberrational is demonstrably false. Government documents show that the methods used at Abu Ghraib were the same ones Mr. Donald Rumsfeld approved, and that the abuse of prisoners in Defense Department custody was systemic.
